forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and a chance of thunderstorms after 11am. Mostly cloudy. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms before 2am. Cloudy. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 48 overnight. West wind 3 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 52. North northwest wind 12 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 39. North northwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
